meanings: [명사] shelling, (오랫동안의) bombardment, cannonade, artillery fire, [동사] fire (at/on/into), shell, (오랫동안) bombard

vlive.korean: 포격한다? I'm going to open fire? 듣기 View video KNK : [마이 크나큰 텔레비전] #47 크나큰(KNK) in 삿포로(Sapporo[札幌])
